Transfluent API Documentation for Developers

The API documentation is RESTful. It reads and writes JSON

To Test the API visit the URI at https://transfluent.com/v2/hello/World which should show the result like

      {"status":"OK","response":"Hello World"}

You can change the last word in the link (Hello in this case) to something else, still the response will be same. Lets say change the world to my Name like https://transfluent.com/v2/hello/Rajib Which should show the result like 

      {"status":"OK","response":"Hello Rajib"}
Alternatively you can grab sample PHP client from GitHub's project page.
